name: SportsRadio1043TheFan,Denver-MorningBrew
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Each morning at 6:30, get your day started right as “Schlereth and Evans” serves up “The Morning Brew.” Mark Schlereth and Mike Evan take you around the world of sports, taking in and breaking down the top stories of the day. So tune in to get your fix before you head out into the world for the day.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
